results.11-11: Aid a desperate farmer trying to save his crops; his land has been overrun by pestilent spirits.

results.1-1: Sister Gizzard’s carrion birds are devouring bogborn villagers. A desperate chieftain seeks help in expelling these malevolent flocks and discovering their ultimate purpose.
results.2-2: Delve into a sunken temple where a sinister sect worships the Bloodbat Spirit, aiming to elevate it to godhood. A concerned elder begs for a disruption of their rituals.
results.3-3: Tazri Swampcaller worries about the silence from the Hydra Spirit. Explore the ethereal realms to reconnect with this sacred entity.
results.4-4: Track an immortal bogborn cannibalizing his kin in the swamp’s heart. A tracker offers guidance to take down this menace.
results.5-5: Participate in Gurash’Atal’s festival of Swamp Spirits, impress a spirit in its trial, and win a rare boon. The master of ceremonies will introduce the challenges.
results.6-6: A rogue spirit priest has absorbed the Whippoorwill Spirit’s power, trapping souls for his malicious designs. A seer asks for aid to free the souls and end his tyranny.
results.7-7: Investigate the Pallid Rot fungus corrupting swathes of the swamp. A renowned herbalist suspects an ancient curse and needs help to find its source.
results.8-8: Accept the Swampsaber Spirit’s challenge to tame wild panthers as mounts. A respected beast master provides the necessary training and tools.
results.9-9: Address the mysterious demise of a dragon turtle washed ashore and filled with eldritch parasites. A sage seeks assistance to investigate this anomaly and prevent a disaster.
results.10-10: An allegiance must be decided when big game hunters clash with a protective swamp Elemental. The huntmaster offers a reward for help, while a spirit priest stresses the Elemental’s importance.
results.11-11: Retrieve a sailor’s body from a shipwreck for a heartbroken fortune teller who promises a valuable reading or boon in return.
results.12-12: Infiltrate a rising army of bogborn thralls under a Spirit Naga’s sway in an ancient city. A rebel leader recruits support to either broker peace or end the Naga’s reign.
